description.value:
You gain the ability to empower, change, and warp your spells. You gain three of the following metamagic options, which allow you to expend sorcery points to alter spells you cast. You gain one more metamagic option at both levels 7 and 15.

@UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-class-features.GJtEQQvgXPzeK1y9]{Accurate Spell}

@UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-class-features.XyqMCVF15WXp6BCj]{Careful Spell}

@UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-class-features.SjNrsjmJ4YQ8ciRW]{Distant Spell}

@UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-class-features.M2RsA6aF28S7i1i3]{Empowered Spell}

@UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-class-features.kiHs53AuvBuYevPh]{Extended Spell}

@UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-class-features.KpqQuwfhZeSoGLWn]{Raw Spell}

@UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-class-features.gbbKnue1XQGSKFzw]{Quickened Spell}

@UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-class-features.WGoOmTnF9fKNlyjg]{Subtle Spell}

@UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-class-features.L0LJwulAo60HVKUc]{Twinned Spell}

You can drag your choices from the above onto your character sheet and it will automatically update.
